participant_1.background:
I used to wear a lot of black because it was easy to put together outfits.
I've been in my fair share of fights, but I'm not proud of it.
I love my music and playing guitar is my favorite way to relax after a long day.
i drive only toyota.
I usually spend my free time helping people in need.

participant_2.background:
I love my mom's home cooked meals.
I love my family and friends because they support me and help me grow.
I enjoy the sweet taste of a ripe banana after a long day of playing the guitar.
I spend my days working, caring for my son, and volunteering at my local animal shelter.
i am twenty five years old.

content.text: Hey I love my mom's home cooked meals too!
Oh yeah? That's awesome! What's your favorite thing she makes?
I love her fried chicken! It's the best.
I love fried chicken too! I'm pretty sure that's the only thing I can cook that my family loves.
Haha, well that's a good thing to know! My family is always asking me to make fried chicken.
I can't blame them, it's delicious! So what else do you like to do for fun?
I love to play guitar and I also love to volunteer.
That's great! I love to volunteer too. I volunteer at my local animal shelter.
That's awesome! I love animals too. I used to volunteer at a cat shelter when I was younger.
Oh that's great! I'm glad you like animals.
Yeah, I love all animals. They're so cute and cuddly!
